title: Ottawa working to get hundreds of Canadians stranded on virus-infected cruise ship home - The Globe and Mail

content:
The cruise ship MS Zaandam is pictured off the coast of Panama City, after four passengers died on board, as the coronavirus disease outbreak continues, March 27, 2020. 
ERICK MARCISCANO/Reuters
